title: Phosphorus-doped In2S3 with rich sulfur vacancies toward efficient photocatalytic hydrogen production from formaldehyde solution
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,2010-2018
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00123K, Paper
Jing Sui, Zhengxin Peng, Nan Lu, KaiCheng Qian, Xiaofan Zhang, Tong Wei, Renhong Li, Xiaoqing Yan
In this study, a P-doped In2S3 photocatalyst with rich S vacancies was fabricated and applied for photocatalytic hydrogen production from alkaline formaldehyde solution.
